name: 022_gatehouse_jump_show_give_attack
expected_full_outputs:
I don't see the word 'with' in that sentence.

Unlocked

Openned. 

Your score is now 10 out of 75

*** Gatehouse ***

You are in the Gatehouse. This sparse but serviceable room guards the entrance to the main castle. Once upon a time it no-doubt bristled with alert guards bearing gleaming arms. Today, it is filled with old furniture, cobwebs, and a musty smell. Dim light filters in from the arrow slits facing the moat while the shadows at the north end of the room hint at the darkness of the main castle beyond.

Upon the wall hangs a Shiny Sword of great antinquity. 

There is a Front Gate to the south and a Foreboding Archway to the north.

There is a Wooden Shelf here. The Wooden Shelf is empty. 

The Royal Hedgehog is here. The Royal Hedgehog is wearing: a Red Bandana.

Wheeeeeee!!! (do you do this often?)

You cast an apraising inner eye and take stock: Manly rough-and-tumble good looks - check, Affable demeanor paired with self-depreciating humor - check!, A lifetime of finely-honed baking skills - check!! Yep - that's you Burt - A fine specimen of a man. If not for the belching, farting, and cussing I don't know how you'd ever manage to fend off the ladies!

In your off hand you hold a Brass Lantern.

You are holding a Rusty Key. 

In your backpack you have: a Cheese Wedge, a Paper Bag, and an Earthen Jug (containing a Well Water). 

The Royal Hedgehog shows no interest in the Cheese Wedge.

The Royal Hedgehog shows no interest in the Rusty Key.

The Royal Hedgehog shows no interest in the Paper Bag.

The Royal Hedgehog shows no interest in the Earthen Jug.

Openned. The Paper Bag contains: a Baked Biscuit. 

The Royal Hedgehog's eyes light up with excitement! Apparently, the Baked Biscuit is a favorite hedgehog delacacy. The Royal Hedgehog gives you a look half way between hopeful and pleading.

The Royal Hedgehog shows no interest in the Rusty Key.

The Royal Hedgehog shows no interest in the Earthen Jug.

You cast an apraising inner eye and take stock: Manly rough-and-tumble good looks - check, Affable demeanor paired with self-depreciating humor - check!, A lifetime of finely-honed baking skills - check!! Yep - that's you Burt - A fine specimen of a man. If not for the belching, farting, and cussing I don't know how you'd ever manage to fend off the ladies!

In your off hand you hold a Brass Lantern.

You are holding a Earthen Jug. The Earthen Jug contains: a Well Water. 

In your backpack you have: a Cheese Wedge, a Paper Bag (empty), a Baked Biscuit, and a Rusty Key. 

Stowed

(with your Fist)

You attack with your Fist and the Royal Hedgehog attempts to dodge!

The Royal Hedgehog seems to view your unarmed swipe as a playful challenge. It drops into a martial arts pose and begins making wax-on, wax-off motions with its paws.

The Royal Hedgehog is easily able to duck and dodge the blow. 

You attack with the Rusty Key and the Royal Hedgehog attempts to dodge!

The Royal Hedgehog is more nimble than you would have guessed! It adroitly balances on the balls of its feet and gets ready to bob and weave.

The Rusty Key whizzes through the air. The Royal Hedgehog is easily able to duck and dodge the blow. 

With a yelp of grateful delight the starving hedgehog leaps upon the Baked Biscuit and begins to devour them.

The Royal Hedgehog is ravenously devouring the Stale Biscuits and is taking no notice of you at all.

Taken

Your score is now 20 out of 75

With the Shiny Sword in hand you are now armed and dangerous!

The Royal Hedgehog has eaten through half the Stale Biscuits but is still giving them all of its attention.

Your sword is glowing with a faint blue glow.

This is an elven sword of great antiquity. The shiny sword glitters even in the dim light. Despite its age, the edge is keen and looks ready for action. There are elven runes engraved upon the blade.


Your sword is glowing with a faint blue glow.
On the Shiny Sword you see: Elven Runes. 

The Royal Hedgehog is nearly done eating all of the Stale Biscuits and is beginning to look around a bit.

This is an elven sword of great antiquity. The shiny sword glitters even in the dim light. Despite its age, the edge is keen and looks ready for action. There are elven runes engraved upon the blade.


Your sword is glowing with a faint blue glow.
On the Shiny Sword you see: Elven Runes. 

The Royal Hedgehog has finished the Stale Biscuits and is vigilantly looking around.

The Royal Hedgehog now looks considerably more bright-eyed and bushy-tailed.

The Royal Hedgehog is looking svelte and chipper but not entirely content. It's clearly grateful for its recent meal but keeps looking at you hopefully.

The Royal Hedgehog is wearing: a Red Bandana.

The Royal Hedgehog gives a small squeek of excitement and a yearning look - clearly hoping that you will return its long-time favorite object.

BURT! What has gotten into you?? We have an evil castle to conquer. Stop trying to slay defenseless woodland creatures!

Burt, I mean it - leave the poor little Hedgehog alone!

Don't say I didn't warn you burt...

You attack with the Shiny Sword and the Royal Hedgehog attempts to dodge!

The Royal Hedgehog squeeks in dismay as it dodges your malevolent agression. It's loyal gaze changes to one of bewilderment and hearbreak. 'Et tu Burtus?' Even as the loyal little creature gives way, you know in your heart that you will come to regret this unkingly deed.

The Shiny Sword swings through the air with a blazing-fast assault. The Royal Hedgehog is terrirfied and flees from the unprovoked attack. 

Your score is now 0 out of 75
